Title: It Sounded Nicer in My Head
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Nick Jones, Jordan Harrison (story editor)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: Paranoia strikes deep for Lolly and Judy, aggravating an already tense situation. Red sticks to a Russian tradition for an important occasion.
